info.title: FMS Log Nexus API
info.description: Centralized logging and job monitoring API for FileMaker Server environments

get.summary: Gets detailed alert information with recent instances.

parameters.name: recentInstanceCount
parameters.description: Number of recent instances to include.

get.summary: Gets an alert instance by ID.

post.summary: Authenticates a user and returns JWT tokens.
Refreshes an access token using a refresh token.
Logs out by revoking the refresh token.

get.summary: Gets the dashboard summary with aggregated statistics.

parameters.name: hours
parameters.description: Number of hours to look back.

get.summary: Searches executions with filtering and pagination.
Gets recent executions for a job.
Gets the last execution for a job.
Gets running executions for a server.
Checks if a job is running.
Gets consecutive failure count for a job.
Gets execution statistics for a job.
Searches jobs with filtering and pagination.
Gets detailed job information with recent executions.

parameters.name: recentExecutionCount
parameters.description: Number of recent executions to include.

post.summary: Registers or updates a job (used by agents).

get.summary: Gets health information for a job.
Gets health overview for all jobs.
Gets job lookup items for dropdowns.
Searches logs with filtering and pagination.

post.summary: Creates multiple log entries in a batch.

get.summary: Gets a log entry by ID.
Gets detailed log entry with related logs.
Gets logs for a job execution.
Gets log statistics for a time range.
Gets distinct server names from logs.
Gets distinct job IDs from logs.
Exports logs matching the filter as CSV.

post.summary: Processes a heartbeat from a server agent.

get.summary: Gets server lookup items for dropdowns.

post.summary: Creates or updates a configuration item.

get.summary: Gets audit entries for a user.
Gets audit entries for an entity.

parameters.name: retentionDays
parameters.description: Retention days (uses config if not specified).

parameters.name: retentionDays
parameters.description: Retention days (uses config if not specified).

parameters.name: keepMinimumPerJob
parameters.description: Minimum executions to keep per job.

parameters.name: retentionDays
parameters.description: Retention days (uses config if not specified).

get.summary: Gets all API keys for a user.

delete.summary: Revokes all API keys for a user.

get.summary: Gets an API key by ID.
Checks if a username is available.
Checks if an email is available.

Bearer.description: JWT Authorization header using the Bearer scheme. Enter 'Bearer' [space] and then your token.
Bearer.name: Authorization

ApiKey.description: API Key authentication. Enter your API key.
ApiKey.name: X-Api-Key
